phrases: Not often that you start a conversation.
Kariu-san and Tamarai-san gave them to me.
As thanks for the other day.
Seems like Hishiro-san's starting to change, too.
It is far too early to be that hyper.
I have low blood pressure, so honestly, I envy you.
Whoa, even Hishiro-san gets jealous sometimes!
But is that really caused by low blood pressure?
I am going to borrow her for a minute!
I think that is the first time I have seen you talking to Yoake-kun.
Ryo was in my class last year.
She calls Oga Kazu-kun like he told her to.
These long vacations are to be treasured!
Do you even get that, young students?
You had to take make-ups after the finals, too.
Then you will be doing make-ups during summer vacation, too.
I have never had to take one myself.
But I have been taking make-ups the entire first term...
I will be coming to prep for entrance exams.
Oga, you are going to some other college?
I am still considering just going on to Aoba University,
but I would like to keep my options open,
so I am going to take the Center Exam Prep Course.
A big hand for our first-term class reps.
Yoake-san mentioned this high school was affiliated to a college.
Guess most of them go there.
They get to be together in college, too.
It has nothing to do with me.
So, to celebrate successfully surviving the first term...
Again, how come we always have to drink at my place?
Well, looking like this, we cannot go out to drink.
But here, we can get the lab to deliver it!
And we can expense it all!
We would like to know your summer vacation plans as soon as possible,
but you do not have any, right?
You are too busy taking make-ups to even visit your family!
Can you pass before the vacation ends?
Anyway, if you do go anywhere, let us know ahead of time.
It may be a vacation, but we still have to observe.
That said, Onoya and I will be joining in summer school,
so we will see you there.
Part of our job is studying furiously
so we can convincingly act like students.
Lots of ways to handle summer vacation.
He really has not noticed, has he?
Unless the rest of us do something,
those two will never get anywhere.
We need to make Oga feel some danger, you know?
If another guy gets close to Kariu-san and tempts her,
even Oga would have to feel something!
Kariu-san is one thing, but how does Oga-kun feel?
Is this really something we should be getting worked up about?
to know better than to toy with the hearts of children.
What is this sadist talking about?
After all the time he is spent toying with my heart?
There is no helping those who are as innocent as Kariu-san.
But there is no reason you could not have something like that.
Get myself a high school girlfriend?
There is no reason you could not.
A one-year, limited edition of youth.
You do not need to remind me.
It is kind of unusual to see you bring lunch from home.
I make one for my dad every day,
so I just double up during holidays.
I seriously did not expect that.
So, how did the make-ups go?
Kariu-san is one thing, but how does Oga-kun feel?
I have never heard any rumors about your love life.
You ever dated a girl before?
I was just wondering if there is anyone you like.
What kind of answer is that?!
What is wrong with your head?
My head's better than yours any day!
We are clearly talking about love!
Like, someone you always find yourself with, or...
And you go, She is interesting.
You do not want anyone taking her away.
I have never looked at anyone like that!
Asking if you had anyone like that.
Studying's important, but I think love is, too.
It is the last summer of high school.
It is a precious time that will not come again.
Before you know it, you will be the only single guy you know!
What is that got to do with it?
Do not reject my very being!
Are you really a modern high school boy?
Studying's important, but I think love is, too.
It is the last summer of high school.
It is a precious time that will not come again.
I have never looked at anyone like that.
I ended up wasting almost the whole day!
But it is still a lot easier than attending an exam school.
You really know how to get on my nerves.
If anyone finds out about ReLIFE,
And he is kind of scary!
It is not some sort of hookup site thing?
K-Kariu, of all people, would never do that.
I do not think he is up to anything that creepy, either.
He is trying to get her in his car!
N-No, I really do not think so...
This clearly is not any kind of date.
Why did you just run out?!
P-P-Please, do not call my name!
Do not get me mixed up in this!
What are you doing here, Oga?
This girl's got a touch of heat stroke.
I just happened to pass by.
I asked if she wanted me to call an ambulance,
but she said it was not that bad.
So I took her somewhere cool and got her a drink,
That is pretty much what I thought.
And given how hot it is,
I did not want to let her walk off alone,
so I offered to drop her at the station.
But obviously she does not want to get into a strange man's car.
Can I leave you with him, then?
Just'because you are young, do not take the heat lightly.
Looks like things are going to work out, so I am going home.
I will walk you to the station.
Thanks for, uh, worrying about me.
You are being so sincere today that it is kind of weird.
You picked the worst timing to say that!
Why are you laughing after I hit you?
No, I just thought, we are always like this.
I was just wondering if there is anyone you like.
You do not want anyone taking her away.
It is the last summer of high school.
It is a precious time that will not come again.
A one-year, limited edition of youth.
I am in love with Kariu.
When I was walking Kariu to the station, I wanted to hold her hand.
you have got to be a man and take action.
There is a fireworks festival soon, right?
Invite her to it, and fess up.
You mean tell Kariu I love her?
What else would you tell her?
But are you okay with dawdling about?
When did you all get here?!
Well, we thought you could use a young girl's point of view.
But even if I do want to confess,
I just do not know where to begin.
An-chan, how would you like a boy to confess his feelings?
As long as he puts his heart into it, it really does not matter.
I have no experience with these things, so I do not know.
Yoake-kun, how would you do it?
I am sure you would make for a great reference.
I have never done it, either.
How did you lure all your girls?
No, you are so relaxed around them.
You have known a lot of girls.
Kaizaki-san has a lot of experience with women?
Well, I apologize for being abnormal.
Stop smiling and help me out here, you support people!
Y-Yoake-kun, surely you have asked someone out or been asked out!
But I bet Arata-kun's pick-up lines are great!
You have got to tell me!
I am sorry I am so abnormal.
I have made up my mind.
I will invite Kariu to the fireworks festival...
Kariu, are you free on the 10th?
Want To go to the fireworks festival together?
Did he send it to the wrong person?
A-Anyway, I would better see what Honoka and Hishiro think...
It seems Oga just invited me to the fireworks festival.
I have been doing homework and studying all summer,
so it will be nice to take a breather.
I got all worked up for nothing...
I have been doing homework and studying all summer, so it will be nice to take a breather.
Are you going to wear a yukata, Hishiron?
Are you going to wear a yukata, Hishiron?
Then let us go shopping together!
I was thinking of getting a new one myself.
I guess I own a lot of dark colors.
Oh, but I like bright colors, too.
I will keep that in mind.
